TestScenario:
<RunList after_run_pause="5000"> <item after_run_pause="0" chdir="../../Utils/SharedMemory/" ignore_run_failed="1" ignore_terminated="1" name="SharedMemory" script="./start_fg.sh" silent_mode="1"/>
<TestList logfile="" logfile_trunc="1" replace="MyGlobalVar2:104,MyGlobalVar:101"> <test name="compare: Equal test"> <action set="111=10"/> <action set="112=10"/> <compare test="111=112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1=Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111=112" holdtime="500"/> <compare test="Test_AI1=Test_AI2" holdtime="500"/>
<test name="compare: Not Equal test"> <action set="111=10"/> <action set="112=11"/> <compare test="111!=112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1!=Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111!=112" holdtime="500"/> <compare test="Test_AI1!=Test_AI2" holdtime="500"/>
<test name="compare: great test"> <action set="111=100"/> <action set="112=10"/> <compare test="111>112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1>Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111>=112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1>=Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111>=112" holdtime="300"/> <compare test="Test_AI1>=Test_AI2" holdtime="300"/>
<test name="compare: less test"> <action set="111=10"/> <action set="112=100"/> <compare test="111<112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1<Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111<=112"/> <compare test="Test_AI1<=Test_AI2"/> <compare test="111<=112" holdtime="300"/> <compare test="Test_AI1<=Test_AI2" holdtime="300"/>
